vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἄτομος, ον,
uncut, unmown, λειμών[Refs 5th c.BC+]in lumps, [Refs 1st c.AD+]; ἄτομον, τό, ={ὑοσκύαμος}, uncertain in Ps.-[Refs 1st c.AD+]
__2 Grammars, of words, not compound, [Refs 1st c.BC+]
__II that cannot be cut, indivisible, γραμμαί[Refs 4th c.BC+]; especially of particles of matter, ἐτεῇ ἄτομα (i.e. σώματα) καὶ κενόν[Refs 4th c.BC+]
__II.2 of Time, οὐχ οἷόν τε εἰς ἀ. χρόνους διαιρεῖσθαι τὸν χρόνον[Refs 4th c.BC+]; ἐν ἀτόμῳ in a moment, [NT+2nd c.AD+]
__II.2.b metaphorically, infinitely small, διαφοραί[Refs 1st c.AD+]
__III in Logic, individual, of terms, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; of the εἶδος, [Refs 4th c.BC+]
__III.2 individual, [Refs]substantive ἄτομον, τό,[Refs 3rd c.AD+]
__III.3 of the summum genus, πρὶν εἰς τὰ ἄ. ἐλθεῖν[Refs 4th c.BC+]. adverb ἀτόμως, ὑπάρχειν immediately, without the intervention of a middle term, [Refs]
vocabInfos.shortDef: in a flash, in a moment, an indivisible unit of time
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
in a flash, in a moment, an indivisible unit of time
indivisible, and by implication exceedingly minute; ἐν ἀτόμω, i.e. χρόνω, in an indivisible point of time, in an instant or moment, 1Cor. 15:52*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: indivisible ; en un momento, en un abrir y cerrar de ojos (1CO.15:52) ;
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 不能分為二的, 無法切割的
1a) 指時間 (林前 15:52)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 不能分为二的, 无法切割的
1a) 指时间 (林前 15:52)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: tích tắc; giây phút; một giây lát.
